query: List top 5 ad groups which has highest clicks
sql:
SELECT gag.ad_group_name, SUM(gap.metrics_clicks) AS total_clicks
FROM advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_ads_performance_2643649617 gap
JOIN advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_details_2643649617 gag ON gap.ad_group_id = gag.ad_group_id
WHERE gap.customer_id = 3424742100
GROUP BY gag.ad_group_id, gag.ad_group_name
ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
LIMIT 5
